Articles.Content: I want to make a shuttle with mark 3 parts but I can't because there is no oxidiser in them, I think there should be a mark 1/2/3 oxi tank dedicated to oxi, just like the fuel tanks are for pure LF. Just a thought.
If you're ok with modding, Real Fuels lets you put any propellant into any tank.

mk1, well the basic rocket fuel tanks are already here...

mk2, only use it for spaceplanes anyways, maybe..

mk3, We definetely need oxidizer, its meant to be spaceshuttle (which used rockets) anyways..

If and when proper fuel tweakables come around, which the devs really should get a move-on with IMHO, then we can manually add this without them needing to do anything. Though if that gets backburnered like resources, then this can be a sound alternative.
